pr_title: Control sync/async publish in Spring Cloud Stream binder

timeline.message: add property to control sync/async publish

timeline.bodyText: While uninitialized defaults to false for boolean, it might be nice to just have sync = false to be explicit on the defaults
timeline.author: dzou

timeline.bodyText: If it's possible, I think it would be better to set the property via spring.cloud.stream.gcp.pubsub.default.producer.sync rather than set the setting through the property class directly. Mainly to verify that spring.cloud.stream.gcp.pubsub.default.producer.sync is indeed the correct format of the property name (as I am not sure what the correct form is myself).
timeline.author: dzou

replies.bodyText: Yes, I've been getting increasingly uncomfortable with the amount of mocking in this test. I'll either move this into an integration test, or turn this test into a light integration test with only a mocked pubsub template.
replies.author: elefeint

replies.bodyText: This is the best I could do without testing SCS implementation details. There is still one mocked transition from our properties into a SCS wrapper, but at least it tests the property mapping correctly.
replies.author: elefeint

timeline.message: set explicit default false value for sync property
update test to be closer to reality
